Text:
Classification: Reality
Genre: Celebrities | Comedy | Family
Status: New Series
Network: Comedy Central ( USA)
Airs: Thursdays at 10:00 pm
Runtime: 30 Minutes
Premiere: February 28, 2013

"The Ben Show" is a sketch/man-on-the-street hybrid starring comedian Ben Hoffman. Each week, Hoffman will take the viewers on a different life journey, which could include him forming a band, finding religion, auditioning for a reality show or trying out volunteer work
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33081)
